Steve Ballmer , chief executive of Microsoft, said the partnership would dramatically accelerate the development of a vibrant and strong Windows Phone ecosystem . Nokia and Microsoft have been working on the development of the first of the new phones for two months, but it will be about a year before the new phones hit the market.

Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. The moves are part of Google Inc. 's plans to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. The changes will be effective on April 4. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, said Eric Schmidt . Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin . However, he will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought
